name: Escape FishStop 3D
description:
Escape FishStop 3D is a horror game with a unique plot.
With crazy plot and lots of characters that make you laugh.
Along with great sound effects and creepy atmosphere.

This is a horror game but is not scary.



In this game, you are the man who is caught up in a4.0 Attitude adjustment program.
And you have to lisyen to the brainwashing sound waves.
But it looks like this can't do anything to you. So you try to escape
And you have been brought to punishment by feeding the demons!

Interesting features

  • Crazy story with a unique identity.
  • Labyrinth dungeons that ready for your adventure.
  • Collect 5 rice sack and find the way out.
  • So many FishStop That ready to chase you.
